#summary Use Cases for the GeoEngine

= Introduction =

Add your content here.


= Use Case List =

*Front End*
  * User can mark a point on a map.
  * User can draw a line of two points on a map.
  * User can draw a line of n points on a map.
  * User can mark a polygon on a map of n points.

*Back End*

  * System can save a geometry.
  * System can load a geometry.
